verses.verse: And the apostles <S%G652><s%> and brothers <S%G80><s%> that were in Judaea <S%G2449><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> had also <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when <S%G3753><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was come <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> they that were of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> contended <S%G1252><s%> with him,
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> You went <S%G1525><s%> in to men <S%G435><s%> uncircumcised, <S%G203><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and did eat <S%G4906><s%> with them.
But Peter <S%G4074><s%> rehearsed <S%G756><s%> the matter from the beginning, <S%G756><s%> and expounded <S%G1620><s%> it by order <S%G2517><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I was in the city <S%G4172><s%> of Joppa <S%G2445><s%> praying: <S%G4336><s%> and in a trance <S%G1611><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a vision, <S%G3705><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> descend, <S%G2597><s%> as it had been a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet, <S%G3607><s%> let <S%G2524><s%> down <S%G2524><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> corners; <S%G746><s%> and it came <S%G2064><s%> even <S%G891><s%> to me:

On the which <S%G3739><s%> when I had fastened <S%G816><s%> my eyes, I considered, <S%G2657><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> four footed <S%G5074><s%> beasts <S%G5074><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and wild <S%G2342><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> and creeping <S%G2062><s%> things, and fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air. <S%G3772><s%>
And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, Arise, <S%G450><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%> slay <S%G2380><s%> and eat. <S%G5315><s%>

But I said, <S%G2036><s%> Not so, <S%G3365><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for nothing <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3763><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> has at <S%G3763><s%> any <S%G3763><s%> time entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

But the voice <S%G5456><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> me again <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1208><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> that call <S%G2840><s%> not you common. <S%G2839><s%>
And this <S%G5124><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> three <S%G5151><s%> times: <S%G5151><s%> and all <S%G537><s%> were drawn <S%G385><s%> up again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> immediately <S%G1824><s%> there were three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> already come <S%G2186><s%> to the house <S%G3614><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I was, sent <S%G649><s%> from Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> to me.

And the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> bade <S%G2036><s%> me go <S%G4905><s%> with them, nothing <S%G3367><s%> doubting. <S%G1252><s%> Moreover <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> accompanied <S%G2064><s%> <S%G4862><s%> me, and we entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man's <S%G435><s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

And he showed <S%G518><s%> us how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> in his house, <S%G3624><s%> which stood <S%G2476><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Send <S%G649><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to Joppa, <S%G2445><s%> and call <S%G3343><s%> for Simon, <S%G4613><s%> whose <S%G3588><s%> surname <S%G1941><s%> is Peter; <S%G4074><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> shall tell <S%G2980><s%> you words, <S%G4487><s%> whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you and all <S%G3956><s%> your house <S%G3624><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

And as I began <S%G756><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, as on <S%G1909><s%> us at <S%G1722><s%> the beginning. <S%G746><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> remembered <S%G3415><s%> I the word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> that he said, <S%G3004><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water; <S%G5204><s%> but you shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

For as much <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them the like <S%G2470><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> as he did to us, who believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> was I, that I could <S%G1415><s%> withstand <S%G2967><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

When they heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, they held <S%G2270><s%> their peace, <S%G2270><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> has God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> granted <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> they which were scattered <S%G1289><s%> abroad <S%G1289><s%> on the persecution <S%G2347><s%> that arose <S%G1096><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> traveled <S%G1330><s%> as far <S%G2193><s%> as Phenice, <S%G5403><s%> and Cyprus, <S%G2954><s%> and Antioch, <S%G490><s%> preaching <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to none <S%G3367><s%> but to the Jews <S%G2453><s%> only. <S%G3440><s%>

And some <S%G5100><s%> of them were men <S%G435><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2954><s%> and Cyrene, <S%G2957><s%> which, <S%G3748><s%> when they were come <S%G1525><s%> to Antioch, <S%G490><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to the Grecians, <S%G1675><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the LORD <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was with them: and a great <S%G4183><s%> number <S%G706><s%> believed, <S%G4100><s%> and turned <S%G1994><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> tidings <S%G3056><s%> of these <S%G846><s%> things came <S%G191><s%> to the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in Jerusalem: <S%G2414><s%> and they sent <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> that he should go <S%G1330><s%> as far <S%G2193><s%> as Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> when he came, <S%G3854><s%> and had seen <S%G1492><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> was glad, <S%G5463><s%> and exhorted <S%G3870><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> that with purpose <S%G4286><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> they would hold <S%G4347><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For he was a good <S%G18><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> and of faith: <S%G4102><s%> and much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> was added <S%G4369><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> to Tarsus, <S%G5019><s%> for to seek <S%G327><s%> Saul: <S%G4569><s%>

And when he had found <S%G2147><s%> him, he brought <S%G71><s%> him to Antioch. <S%G490><s%> And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that a whole <S%G3650><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> they assembled <S%G4863><s%> themselves with the church, <S%G1577><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people. <S%G3793><s%> And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were called <S%G5537><s%> Christians <S%G5546><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in Antioch. <S%G490><s%>
And in these <S%G5125><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> came <S%G2718><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

And there stood <S%G450><s%> up one <S%G1520><s%> of them named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus, <S%G13><s%> and signified <S%G4591><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that there should <S%G3195><s%> be great <S%G3173><s%> dearth <S%G3042><s%> throughout <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the world: <S%G3625><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to pass in the days <S%G1909><s%> of Claudius <S%G2804><s%> Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2531><s%> to his ability, <S%G2141><s%> determined <S%G3724><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> relief <S%G1248><s%> to the brothers <S%G80><s%> which dwelled <S%G2730><s%> in Judaea: <S%G2449><s%>
Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> they did, <S%G4160><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> it to the elders <S%G4245><s%> by the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and Saul. <S%G4569><s%>
